amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 506 pertaining to the further implementation of the coastal and marine spatial planning and ecosystem-based management components of the National Ocean Policy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 506 pertaining to the further implementation of the coastal and marine spatial planning and ecosystem-based management components of the National Ocean Policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 228 (Roll no. 253).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 228 (Roll no. 253).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Farr.
